summary: Build a simple Sports Shop web app featuring a product list, basic cart functionality, and product details.

existing_features.title: Create a Sports Shop home page that displays a list of products with an "Add" button for each product.
Display a cart item count in the header that updates as items are added to the cart.
Seed the product list with these products: Cricket Bat, Football, Running Shoes, Tennis Racket, Sports Jersey.
Apply a coherent, consistent visual theme for the Sports Shop UI (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) across header and product list screens.
Generate and include basic static images as frontend assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the UI.
Add a product details view/page that can be opened from the product list for a specific product, showing that product’s name, image, price, and full description.

Allow adding the currently viewed product to the cart from the product details view, and ensure the cart count in the header updates consistently across both the product list and product details views.
Handle invalid or missing product selection gracefully when opening the product details view (e.g., show a simple “Product not found” message with a way to return to the product list).
Ensure each product’s name is clearly displayed in all existing product presentation areas, including the product list cards and the product details view, using English user-facing text.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a simple Sports Shop app with product list, add-to-cart, and cart item count display
Add product details view/page for each product (navigate from product list and show product information)
Ensure the product name is displayed in the UI (e.g., on product cards and/or any relevant product display areas)
